      • countRepeated

        public static int countRepeated(double[] a)
        Counts the number of repeated elements in a double[].
        Parameters:
        a - a double[]
        Returns:
        The number of duplicate elements (excluding the first instance).
        Complexity:
        O(n)

      • countRepeated

        a - a int[]
        Returns:
        The number of duplicate elements (excluding the first instance).
        Complexity:

      • shouldCompress

        public static boolean shouldCompress(int n,
                                     int n_repeated)
        Decision rule for RLE compression
        Parameters:
        n - Length of series
        n_repeated - Number of repeated elements in the series
        Returns:
        True if compression would lead to space reduction.
        Complexity:
        O(1)
